params._rewardsDuration: How long rewards take to vest, e.g. 30 days (denoted in seconds).

params.account: The account to view information of.

returns.amount: The amount of tokens owned by "account".

params._stakingToken: The ERC20 asset deposited to mint LP tokens (and returned when burning LP tokens).

params.reward: The amount of the _rewardsToken to deposit.

params.account: The account to view information of.

params.index: The index to claim, corresponds to a given index of rewardToken[].

returns.amount: The amount of rewards being distributed.

returns.timestamp: The most recent time (in UNIX format) at which rewards are available for distribution.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

returns.amount: The cumulative amount of rewards distributed per LP token.

params.amount: The amount of the _rewardsToken to deposit.

returns.amount: The amount of tokens in existence.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

transferOwnershipAndLock(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.account: The account to view information of.
params.rewardAsset: The asset earned as a reward.

params.account: The account to view information of.
params.rewardAsset: The reward token for which we want to return the rewardPerTokenstored.

returns.amount: The latest up-to-date value of rewardPerTokenStored.

params.amount: The amount of the _rewardsToken to withdraw.

addReward(address,uint256).notice: Adds a new asset as a reward to this contract.

balanceOf(address).notice: Returns the amount of tokens owned by "account", received when depositing via stake().

depositReward(address,uint256).notice: Deposits a reward to this contract for distribution.

earned(address,address).notice: Provides information on the rewards available for claim.

fullWithdraw().notice: Simultaneously calls withdraw() and getRewards() for convenience.

getRewardForDuration(address).notice: Returns the total amount of rewards being distributed to everyone for current rewardsDuration.

lastTimeRewardApplicable(address).notice: Helper function for assessing distribution timelines.

rewardPerToken(address).notice: Cumulative amount of rewards distributed per LP token.

stake(uint256).notice: Stakes the specified amount of stakingToken to this contract.

totalSupply().notice: Returns the amount of tokens in existence; these are minted and burned when depositing or withdrawing.

viewRewards(address,address).notice: Returns the rewards earned of a specific rewardToken for an address.

viewUserRewardPerTokenPaid(address,addre.notice: Returns the last snapshot of rewardPerTokenStored taken for a reward asset.

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraws the specified amount of stakingToken from this contract.

documentation.text: @dev The ZivoeGlobals contract.
@dev Array of ERC20 tokens distributed as rewards (if present).
@dev Total supply of (non-transferrable) LP tokens for reards contract.
@dev Contains rewards information for each rewardToken.
@dev The order is account -> rewardAsset -> amount.
@dev The order is account -> rewardAsset -> amount.
@dev Contains LP token balance of each user (is 1:1 ratio with amount deposited).

@notice Emitted during addReward().
 @param  reward The asset that's being distributed.

@notice This modifier ensures user rewards information is updated BEFORE mutative actions.
 @param account The account to update personal rewards information if account != address(0).

@notice Returns the amount of tokens in existence; these are minted and burned when depositing or withdrawing.
 @return amount The amount of tokens in existence.
@notice Simultaneously calls withdraw() and getRewards() for convenience.

@notice Stakes the specified amount of stakingToken to this contract.
 @param amount The amount of the _rewardsToken to deposit.
@notice Claim rewards for all possible _rewardTokens.

@notice Claim rewards for a specific _rewardToken.
 @param index The index to claim, corresponds to a given index of rewardToken[].

@notice Withdraws the specified amount of stakingToken from this contract.
 @param amount The amount of the _rewardsToken to withdraw.

@notice This contract facilitates staking and yield distribution.
         This contract has the following responsibilities:
           - Allows staking and unstaking of modular "stakingToken".
           - Allows claiming yield distributed / "deposited" to this contract.
           - Allows multiple assets to be added as "rewardToken" for distributions.
           - Vests rewardTokens linearly overtime to stakers.
